item.title: Starter pack help [317]
item.dc:creator: @puffypain puffypain
item.description:
@puffypain wrote:

I have a code for a starter pack

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("starter")) { if (starter == 0) { addItem(995, 500000); addItem(380, 300); addItem(1323, 1); addItem(841, 1); addItem(882, 1000); sendMessage("You have claimed your Starter Package!"); starter = 1; savemoreinfo(); savechar(); } else if (starter == 1) { sendMessage("You can claim only one starter."); } }

If a new player logged on, and did this code, they would receive the items. If they did it again in the same session, it would say “you can claim only one starter”.

But if they were to log out, and log back in, they will be able to do the starter pack code again, but not twice in the same session.

So my question is: What do i need to add to the code to make the player only get 1 starter pack through all of their sessions?
